title: 820-3536-A No power, orange light, no fan
message:
hi! i have an 820-3536-A that has no power is plugged in.  Liquid damage all over the place. I cleaned it up in the ultrasonic and now I get a green/orange light on the charger but it doesn't boot and the fan doesn't spin. Going through the power rails It seems that I have no PP5V_S3 or PP5V_S0.

PP5V_S5  at C4807 is 2.37v
PP5V_S4 at L4807 pin 2 is 2.37v
PP5V_S3 at L4011 pin 2 is 0v
PP5V_S0 at J6050 pin 1 is 0v

I replaced U7501 because it looked pretty crappy. I've checked around the chip for short to ground and all check out with resistance.  Any ideas of what to look for next? Thanks!

title: 820-3536-A No power, orange light, no fan
message: I bet U7501 is not receiving VIN on pin23.

title: 820-3536-A No power, orange light, no fan
message: I will check that out as soon as I get back to my shop. thanks!

title: 820-3536-A No power, orange light, no fan
message: I have 2.38v on pin 23 of U7501

title: 820-3536-A No power, orange light, no fan
message: Is there actually supposed to be a U5540 on the production boards for this model? In the schematic I don't see NO STUFF but I don't have U5540 and R5440 on the board.  I don't have another board to compare right now. I do have some donor boards on the way, but they take a long time to arrive.

title: 820-3536-A No power, orange light, no fan
820-3536-A No power, orange light, no fan
message: It's there but very low. Chasing that down now. Should have checked that first before I posted anything.  I have an orange light on the DC in so I got distracted and went looking the other way.  I'll go through all of the rails in order to see what's up.  thanks
